name: Angel

aboutpara:
Hello there! Iâ€™m Angel Castillo Jr, a front-end developer with a passion for creating the digital world. With over 1 year of hands-on experience, my canvas has been the browser, where I bring UI/UX designs to life with seamless, responsive, and accessible code.

What sets me apart?

Tech Fluency: Expert in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and React.js, as well as a minuscule amount of work with backend language like node.js with a toolbox augmented by SASS, Redux, and modern libraries/tools.

Design Thinking: A keen eye for aesthetics backed by a solid grasp of design principles ensures my projects are not just functional, but also visually compelling.

User-Centric: I craft experiences that delight users, drive engagement, and scale seamlessly across devices.

Agile Mindset: I thrive in fast-paced environments, adapting to evolving tech landscapes with a growth mentality.

Team Synergy: An enthusiastic collaborator and a believer in the power of team genius to solve complex problems.

I'm not just about coding; I'm about crafting experiences that resonate. Let's connect the dots between creativity and technology to build something extraordinary.

Ready for a front-end virtuoso on your team? Let's chat!

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: During this time i was developing frontend as well as backend projects with my teammates.

education.universityPara: Rice Universityâ€™s Coding Bootcamp where  skills were acquired and earned a certificate in full-stack web development. Passionate about problem solving, developing creative web pages and mobile apps. The strongest attributes are being creative, providing ideas, and being very productive on projects.
